name: Shining Arceus
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

abilities.name: Fabled Defense
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks.

attacks.name: Ultimate Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
